title: Computational Modeling Expert Training Course for Photodynamic Cancer Therapy Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational chemistry knowledge and life science understanding, with data analysis experience
context.additional_context: An offline environment enabling smartphone-based supplementary materials, with an advanced curriculum centered on practical application.

learning_goals: They explain the fundamental principles of photodynamic therapy and the limitations of conventional treatment methods.
A PQY prediction methodology utilizing ELM and SVR-PSO models can be applied
Statistical validation metrics for computational modeling as alternatives to experimental measurements can be interpreted
Improved QSAR modeling approaches for optimizing photosensitizer structures can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
